entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Small splash images on Android 12+ are scaled and blurry #17850
  • CollectionView - Lost focus for Header when new ItemSource assigned #17845
  • Entry ignores TextColor on iOS #17843
    .NET 8 GA
  • Application with multiple windows will not open on macOS after a crash #17841

Closed

  • [ManualMauiTests] [D18] Unable to scroll editor in a scrollview #17840
  • `Border` breaks Xaml Live Preview #17822
  • Regression: AppThemeBinding and VisualStates results in "An item with the same key has already been added" #17832
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] [Android] Button: Set BackgroundColor/Background will increase vertical padding #17685
    .NET 8 GA
  • Completed event does not fire on Return key on Editor #5130
    Backlog
  • Editor field OnCompleted on Android soft keyboard #5730
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Dev/scoban/getridofxamuit #17849
    area/testing

Merged

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17839
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2] Add the new feeds #17842
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2] Update aspnet packages #17837

Updated

  • `sealed` some `internal` classes in `Controls.Core` that are not inherited from (1) #17669
    community ✨
  • `sealed` some `internal` classes in `Controls.Core` that are not inherited from (2) #17671
    community ✨
  • Make Entitlements in Templates for MacCatalyst more consistent between debug and release configs. #17833
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • Fixed CollectionView reordering last item #17825
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Add border visual tests #17633
    s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Fix 17776 #17796
    area/Xaml </>, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 GA
  • [X] revert #5611 #17733
    area/Xaml </>, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 GA
  • Correctly expand rows/columns when grid padding #17750
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Avoid issues creating a Borderless Entry with a custom Handler #17778
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 8 GA
  • Correct InputView.MaxLengthProperty declaring type #17788
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Fix ContentPage BackgroundImageSource not working #17789
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, .NET 8 GA
  • [C] Lowest specificity for propagated values #17648
    .NET 8 GA
  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • Ensure that the navigation page renderer measures its current Page #17164
    area/navigation 🧭, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix for #11991 - CollectionView SelectedItem BackgroundColor is always Gray on iOS #17464
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [android] improve performance of Shell flyout opening #15733
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️, stale, Under Consideration
  • ScrollView content needs layout when ScrollView.InvalidateMeasure is called #17639
    area/layout 🔲, partner/hot-reload-xaml, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Implement gestures on Spans #17731
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [Android] Correctly clear text tapping the clear button on Entry #17543
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Fix Button Ripple Effect not working #17821
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, .NET 8 GA
  • [proposal] Add IgnoreSafeArea #17803
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Fix wrong Layout from hidden CollectionView #17659
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the androidx group with 15 updates #17793
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 2 updates #17773
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
